game.name: Worms Reloaded: Puzzle Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Worms™ Reloaded "Puzzle Pack" features 20 mind-boggling single-player puzzle missions, designed to test even the most cunning Worms™ players. The "Puzzle Pack" also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "puzzle" landscape theme and 12 new Achievements.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Worms™ Reloaded "Puzzle Pack" features 20 mind-boggling single-player puzzle missions, designed to test even the most cunning Worms™ players. The "Puzzle Pack" also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "puzzle" landscape theme and 12 new Achievements.
